I ran into this same problem today and fixed it by running the ck2cti 
utility at the command line (not in Matlab). 

 - Pull up a command window
 - cd to the directory where the .inp file resides
 - type "C:\canteradirectorypath\bin\ck2cti -i chem.inp -t therm.dat 
> mechanism.cti
 - now in matlab cd to the directory where the cti file resides and 
type "g = IdealGasMix('mechanism.cti')"

You can see a reference to this in tut2.m in the Matlab tutorial 
directory. 

Hope this helps.

Brian-

error

error
